Original:
當你在公園放空、看書、欣賞美景或溜小孩的時後，公園旁邊有一間咖啡館，我覺得是件很幸福的事，尤其是很犯困的時後 😆 手邊沒有一杯咖啡怎麼行呢？尤其像我這樣一位咖啡因重度成癮者。

中全公園旁有一間咖啡館，意外發現他們的外帶咖啡，價格非常實惠，價格逼近超商價。但咖啡卻是比超商的咖啡好喝非常多。沒法在店內喝的人，這家咖啡館是一個很好的選擇。推薦他們家的拿鐵。

如果喜愛喝精品咖啡的人，咖啡師對於精品咖啡的研究也是非常的深入。時間如果充裕的話，可以邊喝咖啡，邊與吧檯的咖啡師聊聊，會有收穫的。

他們家的起司蛋糕，是我覺得非常棒的地方。雖然我點的是巧克力起司蛋糕，但其實整體表現上不會太甜，也不會膩口。本以為塗滿巧克力的蛋糕會很甜膩，結果卻不會，整個入口口感非常清爽。

另外，本身支付的習慣有近七成是使用行動支付。而一般咖啡館，最多也就只接受信用卡付款了。對於像我在公園運動、溜小孩時，不見得會帶錢包，使用手機便可以支付款項，對我來說真的是很方便。

#中全公園 #虎林街 #行動支付
EN:
When you are empty in the park, read books, appreciate the beauty or slippery children, there is a cafe next to the park. I think it is a very happy thing, especially when I am very sleepy, how can I do n’t have a cup of coffee at hand?Especially a caffeine -interested addict like me.

There is a cafe next to Zhongquan Park, which accidentally discovered their take -out coffee. The price is very affordable and the price is approaching the super price.But coffee is much better than supermarket coffee.People who can't drink in the store, this cafe is a good choice.Recommend their latte.

If you like to drink boutique coffee, the barista's research on boutique coffee is also very deep.If there is plenty of time, you can drink coffee and talk to the barbalist at the bar, and there will be harvest.

Their cheese cake is where I think it is great.Although I ordered the chocolate cheese cake, in fact, the overall performance will not be too sweet or tired.I thought that the cake full of chocolate would be sweet, but the result would not be, and the whole entrance taste was very refreshing.

In addition, nearly 70 % of the habits they have paid themselves are paid by action.In general cafes, only credit card payment is received.It is really convenient for me to bring wallets when I sports like I move in a park and slipping my children. It is really convenient for me to use my mobile phone.

# # #Action Payment
